body.p: By default the processor generates pages that are mirror images: the right page has the header on the right side, the left pages have the header on the left side. The chapters are following one another with no constraint on the page side.

In the following sections you will see in detaul how to position the start of the chapters on a odd folio number. Some of the CSS rules given here as examples are already listed in [INSTALLATION_DIRECTORY]/css/print/p-optional-double-side-pagination.css. You may choose to import this file from your customization css.
